model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents each player in the game. The players have a number of armies with which they can participate in battles. Each player also has a set of countries that are owned by him. The player can place these armies in any f his owned countries. The players also get a card after each turn, these cards can be exchanged for armies.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Shivani

      • getCardExchangeCount

        public int getCardExchangeCount()
        This method gives the count for the number of cards that a player has. The player gets a card after each turn. When a player captures the last country of another player, the winning player gets all the cards of the defeated player.
        Returns:

      • setCardExchangeCount

        public void setCardExchangeCount(int cardCount)
        This method gives the count for the number of cards that a player has. The player gets a card after each turn. When a player captures the last country of another player, the winning player gets all the cards of the defeated player.
        Parameters:
        cardCount - cannot be more than 5

        public void setCardType(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cardType)
        This method sets the card type for each of the cards owned by the player.
        Parameters:
        cardType - can be of 3 types only : Infantry, Cavalry, Artillery
